Header.describe: Full Stack Developer with a passion for building web applications. Currently seeking opportunities to further develop my skills in a professional setting. In my free time, I enjoy woodworking, which allows me to explore my creativity and attention to detail.

cardOne.title: Full Stack Developer
cardOne.summary: Developed and maintained the trainingpeek.com application using Next.js for the frontend and Node.js for the backend.
cardOne.responsibilities: Developed and designed a web application using Next.js for personalized training. :: Implemented the backend to manage users and payments using the Mercado Pago API. :: Designed and developed the user interface, ensuring a smooth and responsive experience.
cardOne.achievements: Improved application performance, achieving a 30% reduction in page load times. :: Successfully integrated the Mercado Pago API.

cardTwo.title: Junior Full Stack Developer
cardTwo.summary: Developed and maintained web applications using React.js. Collaborated with the team to implement new features and fix bugs. Strengthened my React skills by working on large team projects.
cardTwo.responsibilities: Developed and maintained interactive user interfaces using React.js. :: Collaborated with designers to translate user designs into functional and styled code. :: Implemented agile development practices to improve team efficiency and the quality of the final product.
cardTwo.achievements: Contributed to several major projects, enhancing the functionality and usability of applications. :: Implemented efficient solutions that optimized application performance, resulting in faster load times. :: Received recognition from the team for my problem-solving ability and commitment to code quality.

one.title: Portfolio
one.summary: A portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills.
one.content: Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. :: Supports English and Spanish.

info.description: This project is a custom platform to showcase my work, skills, and experience in web development. Designed with a modern and minimalist approach, the portfolio offers an intuitive and visually appealing user experience.
info.challengesAndSolution: Dark Mode: Implemented a dynamic system for switching between light and dark modes, enhancing accessibility and user experience personalization. :: Multilanguage Support: Added support for English and Spanish, allowing users to easily switch between languages. :: Responsive Design: The portfolio is fully optimized for mobile devices, ensuring smooth and responsive viewing across all screen sizes.
info.features: Built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn/ui :: Animations created using Framer Motion :: Language switching implemented with i18n
info.futureImprovements: Admin Profile: I would like to implement an admin profile to dynamically add and manage content. :: Blog: Create a blog section to share insights and updates on my projects and web development. :: Dynamic Projects Section: Automate the loading of projects from a GitHub repository.
info.technologies: nextjs :: tailwindcss :: typescript :: shadcnui :: framermotion :: i18n

two.title: Microservices
two.summary: Microservices practice with Nest.js, Docker, and NATS as the messaging system.
two.content: Built with Nest.js and PostgreSQL. :: Using NATS as a communication system.

info.description: This project is part of the microservices course at DevTalles Academy. It uses Nest.js to create scalable services, Docker for containerization, and NATS for asynchronous communication between microservices. The services include product management, orders, payments, and authentication.
info.features: Microservices communicated via NATS :: Containerization with Docker :: Product, order, and payment management.
info.futureImprovements: Create an admin profile to dynamically add information :: Improve event management and communication between microservices using advanced messaging design patterns.

tree.title: TrainingPeek Website
tree.summary: Online training platform offering various training activities.
tree.content: Built with Next.js and Node.js. :: Integrated Mercado Pago for payment.

info.description: TrainingPeek is an online training platform developed to offer an intuitive and accessible user experience. It includes user and admin registration features, allowing efficient management of accounts and platform content.
info.challengesAndSolution: Performance Optimization: Implemented optimization techniques like lazy loading of images and static site generation (SSG) to improve load speed. :: Responsive Design: Adapted the design to look and function correctly on mobile and desktop devices using CSS Grid and Flexbox. :: Payment Gateway Integration: Incorporated the Mercado Pago payment gateway to facilitate user transactions.
info.features: User and admin registration :: Integration with Mercado Pago for payments :: Accessible and user-friendly training platform :: Responsive design for mobile and desktop devices. :: UI components developed with NextUI.

four.title: Shortly API
four.summary: A web user interface for creating shortened URLs using the rel.ink API.
four.content: Built with React and SASS. :: One of my first projects from 2022.

info.description: This project was a frontend mentor challenge. The challenge involves integrating the rel.ink API into a web user interface to create shortened URLs, which should be displayed according to the proposed design. I took this opportunity to gain more experience with asynchronous JavaScript. It is one of my first projects and was completed in 2022.
info.challengesAndSolution: Learned to work with APIs and handle asynchronous operations effectively. :: Designed the user interface to meet the specifications of the challenge.
info.features: Integration with the rel.ink API for URL shortening :: User-friendly interface for creating and managing shortened URLs.
info.futureImprovements: Enhance the user experience with additional features like link analytics and custom shortened URLs.

Technologies.mainSkills: nestjs :: nodejs :: typescript :: reactjs :: nextjs :: docker :: postgresql :: mongodb :: html :: css :: javascript :: expressjs :: graphql :: git :: tailwindcss

nestjs.name: Nest.js
nestjs.description: A progressive Node.js framework for building scalable server-side apps.

nodejs.name: Node.js
nodejs.description: A JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 engine, enabling server-side execution of JavaScript.

typescript.name: Typescript
typescript.description: A superset of JavaScript that adds static typing, enhancing developer productivity and code quality.

reactjs.name: React.js
reactjs.description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces, developed and maintained by Meta (Facebook).

nextjs.name: Next.js
nextjs.description: A React-based framework for building server-side rendered applications.

docker.name: Docker
docker.description: A platform for developing, shipping, and running applications inside containers.

postgresql.name: PostgreSQL
postgresql.description: An open-source, object-relational database system known for its robustness and standards compliance.

mongodb.name: MongoDB
mongodb.description: A NoSQL database that uses a document-oriented data model.

html.name: HTML
html.description: The standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser.

css.name: CSS
css.description: A stylesheet language used to describe the presentation of a document written in HTML or XML.

javascript.name: JavaScript
javascript.description: A versatile programming language that is widely used for web development, both on the client and server side.

expressjs.name: Express.js
expressjs.description: A minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework, providing a robust set of features to develop web and mobile applications.

graphql.name: GraphQL
graphql.description: A query language for APIs and a runtime for executing those queries by using a type system defined for your data.

git.name: Git
git.description: A distributed version control system that tracks changes in source code during software development.

shadcnui.name: shadcn/ui
shadcnui.description: A collection of UI components built with Radix and customized with Tailwind CSS.

i18n.name: i18n
i18n.description: An internationalization system that allows managing multiple languages in web applications.

framermotion.name: Framer Motion
framermotion.description: A library for React that enables creating smooth and high-performance animations in web applications.

nats.name: NATS
nats.description: A high-performance messaging system designed for cloud-native applications, enabling communication between distributed services.

mercadopago.name: Mercado Pago
mercadopago.description: An online payment platform that enables secure and efficient transactions for both merchants and consumers.

nextui.name: NextUI
nextui.description: A modern React UI library that provides a set of customizable and responsive components for building user interfaces.

sass.name: SASS
sass.description: A preprocessor scripting language that is interpreted or compiled into Cascading Style Sheets (CSS), adding features like variables, nested rules, and mixins.

tailwindcss.name: Tailwind
tailwindcss.description: A utility-first CSS framework that provides low-level utility classes to build custom designs quickly and efficiently.

one.carrer: NestJS + Microservicios: Aplicaciones escalables y modulares.
